title: Caesars Entertainment Debuts Pennsylvania's First Branded Online Casino Live Dealer Studio in Partnership with Evolution Gaming
subtitle: Caesars Entertainment has announced the launch of Pennsylvania's first branded online casino live dealer studio in collaboration with Evolution Gaming. This innovative partnership marks a significant milestone in the state's gaming industry, offering players an immersive live gaming experience from the comfort of their homes. The new studio is set to enhance the online gaming landscape in Pennsylvania, combining Caesars' renowned brand with Evolution's expertise in live dealer technology.
content:
**Caesars Entertainment Launches Branded Live Dealer Studio in Pennsylvania**

*PHILADELPHIA & LAS VEGAS* — Caesars Entertainment, Inc. (NASDAQ: CZR) has officially unveiled its first branded online casino live dealer studio, enhancing the gaming experience for players on its platforms, including the Caesars Palace Online Casino, Horseshoe Online Casino, and Caesars Sportsbook & Casino in Pennsylvania. This innovative venture is made possible through a partnership with Evolution Gaming, a leader in live casino solutions.

The newly established studio in Philadelphia captures the vibrant atmosphere of the iconic Caesars Palace in Las Vegas, offering players a unique and immersive live dealer experience. The studio features five blackjack tables, including an exclusive VIP blackjack table, as well as a roulette and a baccarat table, ensuring that there are options for all types of players. Each table is adorned with custom felt showcasing the Caesars branding, with select tables also incorporating co-branded elements from professional sports leagues.

Matt Sunderland, Senior Vice President and Chief iGaming Officer at Caesars Digital, emphasized the studio's design, stating, “Creating a fully customized live dealer studio has heightened the user experience on our online casino platforms by providing a Las Vegas Strip-style experience directly in the palm of our players' hands.” He highlighted that the studio draws inspiration from the iconic designs of Caesars Palace, incorporating elements such as the legendary Julius Caesar statue and specific flooring patterns and wall coverings.

Jacob Claesson, CEO of Evolution North America, expressed excitement about the collaboration, stating, “By combining our cutting-edge technology with the unmistakable Caesars brand, this dedicated studio will deliver the elegance and thrill of Caesars Palace to online players in Pennsylvania.” He noted that the new studio exemplifies the potential of live dealer gaming.

The Caesars online platforms are accessible on various devices, including iOS, Android, and desktop, for players aged 21 and older in states such as New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Michigan, Ontario, and West Virginia. The offerings include a wide array of unique Caesars-branded games alongside classic casino favorites, high-limit slots, private live dealer tables, and more. Additionally, these platforms are integrated with Caesars Rewards®, the company’s industry-leading customer loyalty program that allows players to earn rewards through both online and in-person gaming.

Caesars Entertainment remains committed to responsible gaming practices. The company has a long-standing history of promoting responsible gaming, having launched the industry’s first Responsible Gaming program in 1989. Their enhanced 21+ gaming policy restricts access to
